about.creatorA: Ang site na ito ay nilikha at pinapanatili ko, si LaShawn Toyoda! Kung nagkakaproblema ka sa paggamit ng site o nakahanap ng 'false' o 'outdated' na impormasyon, mangyaring makipag-ugnayan sa akin sa pamamagitan ng Twitter {0}
about.creatorQ: Sino ang lumikha ng website na ito?

header.headline: About Find A Doc, the health database for Japan's international community

text.0: We are running this database after our 9-5 jobs. Help us stay awake!
text.1: Consider supporting us if this project has helped you or someone you know.

about.supportA: Ang pinakamahusay na paraan upang makatulong ay sa pamamagitan ng pag-submit sa database ng anumang 'cancellation waiting lists' na iyong matatagpuan. Kung sa tingin mo ikaw ay labis na mapagbigay, maaring bilihan mo ako ng isang kofi!
about.supportQ: Paano ako makakatulong suportahan ang database?

join.headline: Does Find a Docâ€™s mission spark your interests?
join.subheadline: Join us over on GitHub to see how you can contribute!

action.text: Find them on our {frontend} and {localization} Github contributors pages

moreContributors.headline: Plus many more members who have lent us a helping hand!

text.0: LaShawn Toyoda had enough about the lack of clear information regarding the vaccine rollout in Japan from governing officials. A few hours later, Find a Doc was born.
text.1: This database aims to help keep the international community of Japan informed about critical healthcare services in Japan.

0.textHeadline: Watch our daughter, I gotta make something.

text.0: Find a Doc is community-driven with the support of a team of volunteers. Currently, the team is focused on keeping the international community of Japan informed about clinics offering waiting lists for vaccinations to reduce waste.
text.1: In the future, we want Find a Doc to help non-Japanese speaking residents of Japan find clinics that offer services in their native language.

1.textHeadline: You can fill the void by citizen action.

text.0: We try to make sure that all links lead to official resources such as clinic and government websites.
text.1: Read them thoroughly before registering your personal information with them.

text.0: Anyone in the community can submit content to the database.
text.1: As a result, is not possible for us to guarantee complete accuracy. If you notice any errors, please report them to moderators.

text.0: Our moderators try their best to detect fraudulent information.
text.1: However, we strongly encourage you to use your best judgment and do additional research for any services you discover through Find a Doc.

footer.headline: This is an open-source project, and we are not liable for any damages that may be incurred from the use of Find a Doc.
footer.license: Read more about it in our license.

header.headline: Can this information be trusted?
header.subheadline: In short, yes, but do your due diligence.

about.trustA: Ang lahat ng mga links ay pumupunta sa mga official resources tulad ng mga websites ng clinics at gobyerno. Basahin muna ang mga ito bago iparehistro ang iyong personal na impormasyon sa kanila.
about.trustQ: Maaari bang pagkatiwalaan ang impormasyong ito?
about.welcome: Maligayang pagdating sa Find a Doc!
about.whatIsThisA: Ito ay isang community-driven database upang matulungan ang pagkalat ng impormasyon ng mga clinics na may waiting lists para sa pagbabakuna upang hindi sila masayang.

add-clinic.fillForm: Punan ang form na ito upang magdagdag ng isang bagong clinic sa database na may cancellation waiting list.
add-clinic.reviewMessage: Ang clinic na iyong sinubmit ay ipapakita matapos itong suriin!

hero.getVaccinated: Get vaccinated with or without a voucher
hero.helpingResidents: Helping residents of Japan find essential healthcare

index.massSite: Anyone 18 years or older that has a voucher can now get vaccinated at the Tokyo or Osaka mass vaccination sites.
index.prevaccinationScreening: The required prevaccination screening form can be downloaded online! Only the Japanese form is accepted but translations are available.
index.title: COVID-19 Vaccination Cancellation Waiting Lists sa Japan

logout.successMessage: You've been logged out. See ya!

message.disclaimerAlert:
The only vaccines being administered in Japan are Moderna and Pfizer. Be wary of clinics offering SinoVac or others. The content on this site is user generated and while we do our best to moderate it, it may contain errors or unverified content.

We are not liable for inaccurate information that may be contained in the community submissions, and we are not liable for third-party sites. Use your best judgment and please report any submissions you think may be fraudulent.
message.shinYokohamaAlert:
NEWS


Shin-Yokohama vaccine slots available from July 12th for voucher holders. If you live outside Yokohama and wish to register, click here to fill out and print the request form.THEN click the button to book the vaccine!
